Hello!

## Requirements

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages(
  c('servr', 'knitr'),
  type = 'source',
  repos = c('http://yihui.name/xran', 'http://cran.rstudio.com')
)
```

## In RStudio

```{r, eval=FALSE}
servr::jekyll(input = "_rmd", output = "source/_posts")
```
